mapper.insert: insert into board_TB (writter, title, content, hits, create_date, update_date) VALUES((select user_pk from user_tb where user_id = #{boardWritter}), #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardHits}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate})
mapper.select: select user.user_id as writter, bo.title as title, bo.board_no as boardId, bo.create_date from board_tb as bo inner join user_tb as user on bo.writter = user.user_id ORDER BY bo.create_date DESC LIMIT #{startPage}, #{pageNum}
